4.title: Jesse Ventura Says He Would Abolish U.S. Income Tax
4.description: June 8 (Bloomberg) -- Jesse Ventura, former governor of Minnesota, talks about U.S. tax policy.     Ventura also discusses the Anthony Weiner and WikiLeaks scandals. He speaks with Julie Hyman on Bloomberg Television's "Taking Stock." (Source: Bloomberg)

4.title: Can we Fix Capitalism? Yanis Varoufakis vs Gillian Tett
4.description: Yanis Varoufakis and Gilian Tett came to the Intelligence Squared stage in a conversation chaired by Anne McElvoy, to debate whether capitalism is broken and if it needs to be fixed. Tett and Varoufakis both agree that the current model of capitalism needs to change  but they differ radically in the solutions they proffer. …

4.title: Time Is of the Essence… or Is It?
4.description: What is time? Isaac Newton described it as absolute, but Einstein proved that time is relative, and, shockingly, that time and space are intricately interwoven. Now recent work in string theory and quantum gravity suggests that space and time may not be fundamental. If this is true, what new picture of reality will emerge? …

4.title: Capitalism will eat democracy -- unless we speak up | Yanis Varoufakis
4.description: Have you wondered why politicians aren't what they used to be, why governments seem unable to solve real problems? 4.title: Why did Russia attack Ukraine and what are its geopolitical implications?
4.description: This ANU Public Lecture by Emeritus Professor Paul Dibb of the Strategic and Defence Studies Centre examines why President Putin decided to invade the Ukraine and what the implications are for international order, including the risk of a wider war in Europe and the potential use of nuclear weapons.

4.title: Europe's Energy Nightmare Has Only Just Begun
4.description: With Russian gas imports largely cut off, Europe is facing an energy-scarce winter—and next year could be even worse. Europe's energy crisis could finally force countries to dramatically pivot toward renewable energy. …
